com.att.research.xacml.std.datatypes

Class XPathYearMonthDuration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.att.research.xacml.std.datatypes.ISO8601Duration
      • com.att.research.xacml.std.datatypes.XPathYearMonthDuration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SemanticString, java.lang.Comparable<XPathYearMonthDuration>

    public class XPathYearMonthDuration
extends ISO8601Duration
implements java.lang.Comparable<XPathYearMonthDuration>
    XPathYearMonthDuration extends ISO8601Duration to implement the XPath yearMonthDuration data type.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.1 $
    Author:
    car
